text: A powerful weapon brought from the Moon Empress' residence, the blade is as pure as the moonlight, with flowing obsidian flames that can easily dispel magical enchantments on opponents' weapons.

The Gui Po Division is divided into three guards, with only their leaders holding this writ. Hong Ying's "Shadow Crow Guard" is tasked with intelligence gathering and assassination, representing the direct will of the Moon Empress.
Legend claims this mask was sculpted by the Shadow Dragon itself. Its wearer can blend into shadows and move with the wind on the battlefield, striking down generals with deadly precision.
This feather-light robe symbolizes the leadership of the "Shadow Crow Guard" and is the only authority, aside from the Yuanbo, capable of mobilizing the Onyx Crowmen directly.
Hong Ying possesses unparalleled affinity with the Yin winds of magic. His "staff" is the obsidian flames on his blade, transforming to channel magic or strike down foes as needed.

Shadow Grace is a Taiyue Luan gifted by the Moon Empress to Hong Ying. It is said to be the Moon Empress' apparition. The Onyx Crowmen respond to its call, channeling the winds of Yin and becoming legendary birds of prey.
The largest and most bloodthirsty of its kind, its razor-sharp talons decapitate enemies, leaving a trail of viscera and severed limbs in its wake.
The largest and most bloodthirsty of its kind, its razor-sharp talons decapitate enemies, leaving a trail of viscera and severed limbs in its wake.
A statue of the Bear God mounted on a colossal frost construct, reigning over cold and death, inseparably linked to Kislev and Ursun's divine favor.

The pinnacle of craftsmanship, perfected by Tomb Technicians over generations on a massive obsidian slab. It now soars above the pyramids, carrying the Tomb Kings in defiance of the heavens.
This giant vulture is adorned with the bones of its god's enemies. The cost to tame this stormy shadow remains unknown.

Awakened Tomb Technicians ride these majestic creations, their solemn banners heralding awe and fear across the battlefield.
Regardless of the enemy's identity or danger, Alastar charges courageously atop his war lion, earning the pride of the Lion Fathers.
The Spirit of Grungni is a thunder barge crafted by the Slayer Engineer Malakai Makaisson.
The fiercest and largest of their kind, only the eldest beings possess the presence to operate the God Engine.
